courses.title: Advanced Seismic Design Principles
courses.description: Comprehensive coverage of modern seismic design principles including performance-based design, nonlinear analysis, and the latest building code requirements. Learn practical applications for earthquake-resistant structures.
objectives: Apply nonlinear static and dynamic analysis techniques

courses.title: Bridge Inspection and Maintenance
courses.description: Essential training for bridge inspection following NBIS standards. Covers inspection techniques, condition assessment, load rating, and maintenance strategies for various bridge types.

courses.title: Steel Structure Design Updates
courses.description: Stay current with the latest updates to AISC specifications and design guides. Focus on new provisions for stability design, connection design, and seismic applications.

courses.title: Highway Safety Design Standards
courses.description: Comprehensive review of highway safety design including roadside design, intersection safety, and implementation of the Highway Safety Manual. Includes case studies and practical applications.

courses.title: Traffic Flow Analysis and Optimization
courses.description: Advanced traffic engineering concepts including capacity analysis, signal timing optimization, and intelligent transportation systems. Uses latest HCM methodologies.

courses.title: Pavement Design and Management
courses.description: Modern pavement design methods including mechanistic-empirical design, pavement management systems, and sustainable pavement practices. Covers both flexible and rigid pavements.

courses.title: Stormwater Management Best Practices
courses.description: Comprehensive stormwater management including LID techniques, green infrastructure, water quality treatment, and regulatory compliance. Emphasizes sustainable design approaches.

courses.title: Flood Risk Assessment and Mitigation
courses.description: Advanced flood risk assessment techniques including hydrologic and hydraulic modeling, floodplain mapping, and design of flood mitigation measures.

courses.title: Water Treatment Plant Design
courses.description: Complete water treatment plant design from source to distribution. Covers conventional and advanced treatment processes, regulatory requirements, and optimization strategies.
objectives: Meet Safe Drinking Water Act requirements

courses.title: Foundation Design for Difficult Soils
courses.description: Specialized foundation design techniques for challenging soil conditions including expansive soils, collapsible soils, and liquefiable soils. Includes ground improvement methods.

courses.title: Slope Stability Analysis
courses.description: Comprehensive slope stability analysis methods including limit equilibrium and finite element approaches. Covers natural slopes, embankments, and excavations.
objectives: Use software tools for stability calculations

courses.title: Retaining Wall Design Methods
courses.description: Design of various retaining wall systems including gravity walls, cantilever walls, and mechanically stabilized earth walls. Includes seismic design considerations.

courses.title: Environmental Impact Assessment
courses.description: Comprehensive environmental impact assessment procedures including NEPA compliance, environmental site assessments, and mitigation strategies for infrastructure projects.

courses.title: Sustainable Infrastructure Design
courses.description: Sustainable design principles for civil infrastructure including green building practices, renewable energy integration, and life-cycle assessment methodologies.

courses.title: Remediation Technologies
courses.description: Modern remediation technologies for contaminated sites including soil and groundwater treatment methods, vapor intrusion mitigation, and emerging technologies.

courses.title: Engineering Ethics and Professional Responsibility
courses.description: Essential ethics training for professional engineers covering professional codes of conduct, ethical decision-making, and case studies of engineering failures and successes.

courses.title: Project Management for Engineers
courses.description: Project management fundamentals tailored for engineering projects. Covers planning, scheduling, budgeting, risk management, and team leadership.

courses.title: Risk Management in Engineering
courses.description: Comprehensive risk management strategies for engineering projects including risk identification, assessment, mitigation, and monitoring throughout the project lifecycle.

bundles.name: Essential Pack
bundles.description: Perfect starter package for meeting annual PDH requirements

bundles.name: Professional Pack
bundles.description: Comprehensive package for two-year renewal cycles

bundles.name: Annual Unlimited
bundles.description: Access all courses for one full year
